CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations when rule_locale_en[:type] is 'Unknown' errors on :rule_locale_en should include "type is invalid"
CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations when rule_locale_en[:comparator] is 'unknown' should have 1 error on :rule_locale_en
CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations when rule_locale_en[:comparator] is 'unknown' errors on :rule_locale_en should include "comparator is invalid"
CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations when rule_locale_en[:type] is 'String' and rule_locale_en[:comparator] is '<' should have 1 error on :rule_locale_en

examples.description: should include "String only supports equality comparison"
examples.full_description: CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations when rule_locale_en[:type] is 'String' and rule_locale_en[:comparator] is '<' errors on :rule_locale_en should include "String only supports equality comparison"
CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations when rule_locale_en[:type] is 'String' and rule_locale_en[:comparator] is '==' should have 0 errors on :rule_locale_en
CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations when rule_locale_en[:type] is 'Float' and rule_locale_en[:compare_value] is '1' string should have 1 error on :rule_locale_en

examples.description: should include "compare_value should be a float"
examples.full_description: CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations when rule_locale_en[:type] is 'Float' and rule_locale_en[:compare_value] is '1' string errors on :rule_locale_en should include "compare_value should be a float"
CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations when :rule_locale_es is nil should have 0 errors on :rule_locale_es
CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations and rule_locale_es[:attribute] is different from rule_locale_en[:attribute] should have 1 error on :rule_locale_es

examples.description: should include "if 'es' locale rule is provided, its 'attribute' must equal to the 'en' rule's 'attribute'"
examples.full_description: CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations and rule_locale_es[:attribute] is different from rule_locale_en[:attribute] errors on :rule_locale_es should include "if 'es' locale rule is provided, its 'attribute' must equal to the 'en' rule's 'attribute'"
CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations and rule_locale_es[:type] is different from rule_locale_en[:type] should have 1 error on :rule_locale_es

examples.description: should include "if 'es' locale rule is provided, its 'type' must equal to the 'en' rule's 'type'"
examples.full_description: CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations and rule_locale_es[:type] is different from rule_locale_en[:type] errors on :rule_locale_es should include "if 'es' locale rule is provided, its 'type' must equal to the 'en' rule's 'type'"
CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations and rule_locale_es[:comparator] is different from rule_locale_en[:comparator] should have 1 error on :rule_locale_es

examples.description: should include "if 'es' locale rule is provided, its 'comparator' must equal to the 'en' rule's 'comparator'"
examples.full_description: CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations and rule_locale_es[:comparator] is different from rule_locale_en[:comparator] errors on :rule_locale_es should include "if 'es' locale rule is provided, its 'comparator' must equal to the 'en' rule's 'comparator'"
CareToDoItemAlertRule Validations and rule_locale_es[:compare_value] is a number and is different from rule_locale_en[:compare_value] should have 1 error on :rule_locale_es

examples.description: should include "if 'type' is 'Float', then 'es' 'compare_value' must equal to the 'en' rule's 'compare_value'"

CareToDoItemAlertRule#should_trigger_alert_on? for alert rule_locale_en: {:attribute=>"answer_1", :type=>"Float", :comparator=>">", :compare_value=>1, :alert_message=>"Low Blood pressure %s", :alert_title=>"Clinical Alert"} and rule_locale_es: {:attribute=>"answer_1", :type=>"Float", :comparator=>">", :compare_value=>1, :alert_message=>"Low Blood pressure %s (es)", :alert_title=>"Clinical Alert"} for sent_back_data_locale :en for sent_back_data: {"answer_1"=>"3"} should eq true
